titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN AND SECTIONS of SEERA MOLE in the FRONT BAY of ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:585 x 934 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Compiled and signed by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers Lieutenant Colonel C.W. Grant and Major Artillery William Jacob, Bombay 23rd April 1844.Includes outline plan with corresponding sections. Lettered for reference with water levels and measurements reported.Inscriptions:Bottom left-hand corner:‘Ex. Engineer’s Office Aden, 23rd of December 1843’.Bottom right-hand corner:‘(Signed) Henry W.B. Bell 2nd Lieutt. Ag. Ex. Engineer’.
